Detailed Description

template<std::size_t length>
struct template_str_buffer< length >

Used in consteval literal operators implemented for strings, that way both the length and the contends of the string can be used with static_assert to raise compile-time errors.

CYD-UI uses this type for color declaration:

auto c = "#FCAE1E"_color; // Ok auto c1 = "#FCAE1Eaaaa"_color; // Compile-time error, invalid length

length
